item.description:
Lindsay and I are having another Darwin Day celebration like last year, but at our place in Dracut. We were thinking of maybe showing one or a couple short videos. Maybe start out with a little Penn & Teller on Creationism to warm things up and follow-up with some of PBS's special, Judgement Day: Intelligent Design on Trial (with Ken Miller who was present at the Creation movie event). It will be a pot luck affair. We will have some food, drinks, and probably a birthday cake for good ol' Charlie D. People are invited to bring their own Darwin beards if they feel so inclined. Here's one example.

So, come join us in celebrating one of the most influential homo sapiens in homo sapien history.
Please RSVP.

~Darrick & Lindsay
item.name: Darwin Day Celebration!
